text:
Things are a lot different when it comes to International Awards. Oscars, for instance, is one of the most reputed award functions, and people actually wait to see who wins the awards in various categories. For People’s Choice Awards, on the other hand, fans vote to make their favourite artiste win.
People have apparently not got over with Swara Bhasker’s commendable masturbation scene in Veere Di Wedding. The scene had received a lot of flak on social media, and looks like people are still trolling her over that.
Don't Miss 106 SHARES 7.4 K SHARES
“So, Shah Rukh sir called me and said: 'It was my birthday a few days ago. It's just a chill dinner, so, come with your friends.' It was my first time at Mannat and I was so happy that it was a chill get-together for his birthday,” Vicky said on a chat show.
Salman Khan is currently attending the Saudi Film Festival. During an interaction with all his fans, he was in a happy mood and answered all the questions!
After the Taimur doll took over the internet some time ago, now a whole new level of Taimur’s popularity was seen at the Cosmo India Blogger’s Award 2019, where Taimur cookies were served to the guests.
title: Swara Bhasker Trolled Again, Kunal Kohli Slams Indian Film Awards And More From Entertainment!
description: Things are a lot different when it comes to International Awards. Oscars, for instance, is one of the most reputed award functions, and people actually wait to see who wins the awards in various categories. For People’s Choice Awards, on the other hand, fans vote to make their favourite artiste win.
